Articles.Content: The navball switching between orbit/surface/target mode automatically keeps messing things up. Is there a mod to turn this off? I have not found this option in the settings.

Hi @Sparffles, to my knowledge there isn't a setting that changes this behaviour so your issue has been moved from KSP discussions to Add-on Discussions because there may be a mod that does this.

I would also love to see such a feature in settings.

Edited November 20, 2021 by James Kerman
Added line

Hey @Sparffles! You can switch the modes on the navball by clicking on the speedometer just above the navball.  It goes in a cycle of surface, orbital, and target (only when you have selected a target.). I hope you find this informative and helpful.
